headline: BXP announces extension of CEO Owen Thomas’ employment agreement
summary: BXP (BXP) announced that it amended and restated its employment agreement with Owen Thomas, the current CEO and Chairman of the Board of Directors of BXP. Thomas’ new agreement is fundamentally the same as his previous agreement, and it is intended to more closely align the term of his employment with the multi-year, strategic action plan introduced at BXP’s Investor Day on September 8, 2025. Thomas’ agreement was scheduled to expire in December 2026, and the term of the new agreement covers the
